ABOUT.comment: Header for a general description, e.g. of a user, or of iNaturalist itself

Agree.comment: Label for button that adds an identification of the same taxon as another identification

AGREE.comment: Label for button that adds an identification of the same taxon as another identification

all-rights-reserved.comment: As in intellectual property rights over a photo or other creative work

Any.comment:
Generic option in a menu of choices that indicates that any of the choices
would be acceptable

Casual--quality-grade.comment:
Quality grade indicating observation does not quality for Needs ID or
Research Grade, e.g. missing media, voted out, etc.

Clear.comment:
Label for a button that clears content, like the text entered in a text
field

Close.comment: Label for a button that closes a window or popup

Data-quality-assessment-date-is-accurate.comment: Data Quality Assessment section label: whether or not the observation date is accurate

Data-quality-assessment-date-specified.comment: Data Quality Assessment section label: whether or not the observation date was specified

Data-quality-assessment-title-research.comment: Data Quality Assessment description of the final quality grade when Research Grade
Data-quality-assessment-title-research.val: 본 관찰은 연구 자료 등급 관찰입니다!

Date-Range.comment: Label for controls over a range of dates

Delete-photo.comment: Button label or accessibility label for an element that deletes a photo

Edit-location.comment: Label for interactive element that takes you to a location choosing screen

Endemic.comment: Indicates a species only occurs in a specific place

Error.comment: Title for a section describing an error

Error-title.comment: Title of dialog or section describing an error

Go-back.comment: Label for button that returns to the previous screen

Log-in.comment: Second person imperative label to go to log in screen

Menu.comment: Accessibility label for a button that opens a menu of options

Nearby.comment: Header or button label for content that is near the user's current location

Needs-ID--quality-grade.comment: Quality grade indicating observation still needs more identifications

New-Observation.comment: Heading when creating a new observation

Observe.comment: Button that starts a new observation

OK.comment: Generic confirmation, e.g. button on a warning alert

Other.comment:
Generic option in a list for unanticipated cases, e.g. a choice to manually
enter an explanation for why you are flagging something instead of choosing
one of the existing options

Projects.comment: As in iNat projects, collections of observations or observation search filters

Research-Grade--quality-grade.comment:
Quality grade indicating observation is accurate and complete enough to
share outside of iNat

Reset-verb.comment:
Label for a button that resets the state of an interface, e.g. a button that
resets the sound recorder to its original state

Restore.comment: Label for button that restores a withdrawn identification

Satellite--map-type.comment: Label for the satellite map type

SAVE.comment: Label for a button that persists something

Save.comment: Label for a button that persists something

Standard--map-type.comment: Label for the standard map type

Stop-verb.comment: Imperative verb for stopping the recording of a sound

Unknown--rank.comment: Text to show when a taoxn rank is unknown or missing

Unknown--taxon.comment: Text to show when a taxon or identification is unknown or missing

Unknown--user.comment: Text to show when a user (or their name) is unknown or missing

View-suggestions.comment:
Label for a button that shows identification suggestions for an observation
or photo

Withdraw.comment: Label for a button that withdraws an identification
